doc.summary: Returns a <ref cls="java/util/stream/Stream">Stream</ref> of <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/ItemStack">item stacks</ref> to add to a creative tab.
doc.text: Returns a <ref cls="java/util/stream/Stream">Stream</ref> of <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/ItemStack">item stacks</ref> to add to a creative tab.  <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/creativetab/CreativeTabX">CreativeTabX</ref> respects these by default.

doc.summary: Base class for <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/Item">items</ref> for mods using <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/mod/ModXRegistration">ModXRegistration</ref>.
doc.text: Base class for <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/Item">items</ref> for mods using <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/mod/ModXRegistration">ModXRegistration</ref>. This will automatically set the  creative tab if it's defined in the mod.
